effect.malum.burning_fervor.description: 燃え上がる熱意で採掘と攻撃速度が上昇する。
effect.malum.fiery_embrace.description: 炎があなたを包み込み、傷を癒す。
effect.malum.flowing_grasp.description: 射程とアイテム回収範囲が増加する。
effect.malum.good_tides.description: Let any fish who meets my gaze learn the true meaning of fear; for I am the harbinger of death. The bane of creatures sub-aqueous, my rod is true and unwavering as I cast into the aquatic abyss. A man, scorned by this uncaring Earth, finds solace in the sea. My only friend, the worm upon my hook. Wriggling, writhing, struggling to surmount the mortal pointlessness that permeates this barren world. I am alone. I am empty. And yet, I fish.
effect.malum.howling_gale.description: そよ風があなたを前進させ、移動速度を上げる。
effect.malum.oaken_might.description: あなたの拳と道具は大地で強化され、力が増す。
effect.malum.sky_tether.description: 天があなたを呼び寄せ、ジャンプ力を上げ重力を低下させる。
effect.malum.stone_ward.description: 大地の甲羅があなたの体を包み、追加の防具として機能します。

malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.arcane_re: 修繕のパイロンはインペタスのみに使用できるわけではない。 より平凡な、あるいは魔法的な道具も、経験値を消費せずに修理できる。修復には素材が必要であり、アイテムの耐久度の約半分を回復する。

Gear made of material that resonates with spirits - created from or by them - seems to be even more effectively repaired by this. Most, if not all, of the tools and armor written of in this book will be restored by three quarters of durability, rather than half.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.aura_empo: Created using a combination of ソウルウッドのand ルーンwood, the アルカナパイロン excels at channeling Spirit アルカナ. By supplying it with Spirits, their stored energy can be spent.

Totems are designed to avoid a constant demand for Spirits. Whenever a 儀式 activates, an Echo is formed, matching the Totem's Spirit Sequence in effect with little to none strain placed upon it. This works well for a passive effect, but it does limit potency significantly. The アルカナパイロン makes up for that limiting factor, allowing Totem Magic to reach it's full potency.

By utilizing Elemental アルカナ, the Pylon becomes a totemic amplifier. It weaves a 儀式 焦点, which enhances any matching オーラ効果 granted by ルーンs or Totems upon contact. One Spirit is enough for roughly four activations.

By utilizing 生のアルカナ, the Pylon takes on a role similar to the ルーンウッドのObelisk. Each Pylon will accelerate speed of a nearby Altar by Fifty Percent, up to Four Pylons. One Spirit is enough for roughly Sixteen Infusion Cycles.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.basic_art: Redstone is always useful, no matter your profession or goal. One needs not be an engineer to build a piston door. I now add my own contribution: spirit diodes. By imprinting the impulses of elemental spirits upon a matrix of ether-treated copper, I have created four interesting redstone devices.

These diodes act by translating redstone impulse into arcane intent, allowing the nature of the spirit to shape the resulting effect, and then translating it back. Ether serves as the medium, with copper acting as a conceptual anchor to machinery and logic.

I have also developed a tool to tweak the timing of these diodes. By using it to move parts of the copper matrix via a prolonged application of the tool, you can lengthen or shorten the delays involved in a diode, with a single redstone tick being the lower limit.
水seeks to change, to adapt. Given a signal, this transfers it but is 'sticky', continuing to emit the signal for a while after power is cut.
焦熱seeks to burn, to shine. Given a signal, this transfers it but is 'slow', the signal being held - 'admired' - by the diode for a time before being emitted out the other side.

大気seeks to soar, to rise. Given a signal, this transfers it but needs to 'warm up', causing the output's strength to slowly rise to meet the input signal. When unpowered or given a lower signal, it will similarly coast down until it turns off again.
大地seeks to stand, to stay. Given a signal or lack thereof, this acts like a clock, emitting the inverse of the input every so often on a steady rhythm, and emitting the input the rest of the time.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.belt_of_t: When 強欲 is successfully channeled through a tool with a submaximal 幸運 enchantment, the applied bonus will be raised as if 幸運 was at it's maximum level. Similarly, The 炭鉱夫のベルト will bless any explosions $iI/$ create with 幸運 III, plus the bonus from 強欲.

While wearing the 炭鉱夫のベルト, any valuable resources I extract will carry an imbued intent, an overflowing 強欲. Upon collection of such intent, the carried 強欲 is temporarily inscribed onto my soul. Each amplitude of 強欲 enables an added One Tenth chance for an additional level of 幸運 when breaking blocks.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.blight.fl: While experimenting with the interaction between 汚染 and 骨粉, I have observed two plants that frequently emerge; the ブライトルート and the ブライトパール. Neither of these are useful in any way whatsoever, but they appear to thrive within 汚染 alone without the need for water or light. Interesting.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.caustic_c: 焦熱と水はmix energetically, often in transformative and destructive ways. The 強酸カタリスト increases Tuning Potency the further the instability of the system rises, harnessing that bubbling backlash for greater power.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.focus_ele: Wind Charges are objects with fascinating implications. They are clearly created, but historians are not clear on who created them, or why. Regardless, what was created can be made again, given the right インペタス. The Heavy Core and 風の核 create the ゼフィールのインペタス - though it is extremely slow to operate, due to the complexity.

The 風の核 is a remnant of the Breeze, and, while it is analogous to a soul, it is not one. Given the fact that I needed a 風の核 to recreate it, this cannot have been how the originals were created, and I do not understand the nature of their artificial existences enough to delve further.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.geas_magi: 誓い and sacrifices hold power. Brooches, for example, sacrifice one thing for another. There are legends of those who willingly forswear something, gaining power from that action. I have devised a way to bind to a soul semi-permanently such a pact, or $bgeas/$, through the Soulbinding Brazier.
The Brazier is less a device and more a conduit, utilizing Hallowed 金のinlay and Cthonic 金のinsets to conduct souls. Ether is used to ignite it, once the materials are arranged.

Each 誓い requires material sacrifices, in the form of a central item, additional ingredients, and arcana to fuel the bond, inserted into the Brazier directly. Once lit, you must offer blood to seal the pact. Do so by interacting with the brazier. Any number of willing participants may offer blood to this end at once.

ギアス can be applied even to simpler souls, though they might not know how to take advantage of them. A creature can be tempted to join a geas by afflicting it with Weakness before igniting the Brazier.
Each soul only seems to have capacity for two separate geas at once, with additional ones failing. These are, again, tied to the soul itself, and so cannot be removed without significant effort.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.locus_man: Spirit 儀式 are all rather uniform - simpler 儀式 deliver their effect via a Seeking 儀式 焦点, whereas more complex 儀式 - those which seek to affect the world and thus have no clear target - utilize a 紐づけられた儀式の焦点 instead.

When initially woven, the 紐づけられた儀式の焦点 simply wanders in whichever direction the totem demands. I've measured it's speed at precisely four blocks per second with a lifespan capable of supporting eight activations of it's carried effect.

Tainted Rock bears a unique adversity to magic. It disrupts and eventually unravels the flow of arcana entirely. Without a carefully constructed form however, the disrupting property is all that demands consideration. When traveling over tainted rock, the 儀式の焦点 will not take effect and as such will not progress towards it's eventual end.
Lastly, as the 儀式 焦点 is not a tangible object, it bears no mass, and as such it is unaffected by gravity and can seamlessly phase through any solid matter.

The 儀式アンカー is an apparatus designed to direct and augment any wandering 儀式の焦点. By socketing it with spirit arcana, a travel vector is defined and begins to influence any passing locus. The nature of the arcane etching utilized for the vector is rather delicate, and as such the rite anchor cannot operate when influenced by redstone.
紐づけられた儀式の焦点に大気のアルカナを注入すると, it will gain the benefit of increased speed, causing it to move through the world faster. This effect can be applied twice per locus, doubling speed each time.

紐づけられた儀式の焦点に水のアルカナを注入すると, it will gain the benefit of increased potency, causing it to interact with certain rite anchor etchings more effectively. This effect can be applied twice per locus, doubling potency each time.

紐づけられた儀式の焦点に生のアルカナを注入すると, it will simply alter it's travel vector with no other effect or cost. 生のアルカナを注入すると is pure energy without any direction leading to a rather mundane, yet appropriate effect here.

紐づけられた儀式の焦点に大地のアルカナを注入すると, it will gain the benefit of increased impact, causing it to apply a stronger effect with each activation. This effect can be applied twice per locus, doubling impact each time.

紐づけられた儀式の焦点に異形のアルカナを注入すると, it will dissociate and split into two separate, functionally identical loci. This effect can be triggered up to four times per locus. Copies are monochrome and cannot cannot be copied.

The 焦点makes for a rather primitive arcane construct, it does not excel at anything in particular and thus can be rather limiting in what it can accomplish. Through elemental arcana - transmitted through the rite anchor - I've already solved this problem, however it does demand further documentation.

When a 儀式の焦点 travels over a rite anchor bearing either an 大気, Aqueous, 大地のor 焦熱のetching, it will receive an elemental boon. Within each group, only the first two applications of the boon bear any effect. Furthermore, due to it's simple design, the 儀式の焦点 can only accept four total boons.
紐づけられた儀式の焦点に焦熱のアルカナを注入すると, it will gain the benefit of increased distance, causing it to cover more ground before expiring. This effect can be applied twice per locus, doubling distance each time.
紐づけられた儀式の焦点に聖なるアルカナを注入すると, it will mend itself over time, restoring lost lifespan and thus allowing it to travel further. This effect can be triggered up to four times per locus.

紐づけられた儀式の焦点に邪悪なアルカナを注入すると, it will sacrifice the benefits of an already applied elemental boon in order to mend itself within an instant. The same limit imposed onto the sacred effect is applied here.

The 焦点is a primitive arcane construct, my first design of it was nothing more than an effect etched onto a form capable of movement. Self-Preservation ended up being a necessary factor in it's design, nothing like how a living creature would exhibit such a trait- but self-preservation nonetheless.

When met with the command of 邪悪なアルカナ, the 焦点is forced into self-sacrifice. It will forgo any elemental boons it has already been imbued with. Being the least significant, Speed is expunged first. Potency falls next, with Impact being culled afterwards. Distance, being the most significant trait of the 焦点is only sacrificed if no other boon is available.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.mirror_ma: For general item transport, mirrors will create a portal-esque gravity tunnel, a leyline. This leyline will be capable of picking up and transporting items forward. Depending on what lens you create for your mirror, the leyline will acquaint different properties. In the next release, either Voodoo Magic or Mirror Magic will be added to malum.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.necklace_: リバウンド and 上昇 are interesting enchantments, from a categorical perspective. Neither association has any wind implication, and yet 大気のis their arcana all the same. In the course of investigating this, I discovered how to alter リバウンド with an effect I name the Howling Maelstrom.

リバウンド is reaping, and a Wind Charge has been reaped. By utilizing that connection, this ring causes cutting winds to spin about the scythe when thrown, damaging things around, at the cost of a longer cooldown afterwards.
By wearing both the ナローエッジの首飾り and the 唸る大渦の指輪, I concentrate these winds to the moment the scythe strikes a foe, creating a small storm there for around two seconds.

リバウンド and 上昇 are interesting enchantments, from a categorical perspective. Neither association has any wind implication, and yet 大気のis their arcana all the same. In the course of investigating this, I discovered how to alter 上昇 with an effect I name the Rising Edge.

A Wind Charge is presumably something constructed by tools, though I know not by who or how. Utilizing that connection, at the cost of a decrease to damage, those cut by 上昇's blades of wind under the Rising Edge’s effect will also find themselves launched upwards. Useful for crowd control and whatnot, but like the scythe itself, the Narrow Edge can change this purpose.
By wearing both the ナローエッジの首飾り and the 昇る刃の指輪, the concentrated sweep of wind launches with vastly increased potency, allowing me to juggle my enemies above me.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.resonance: 大気and 大地do not interact, generally, but non-interaction is useful in its own way. The 共鳴調律器 dampens the interaction of forces in the Crucible, heavily decreasing or even eliminating instability by causing the process to take longer.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rite_of_a: 高位儀式, 効果中は紐づけられた儀式の焦点を作り出す。 焦点がブロックを通過すると反転した重力効果を与え,最大16ブロック上向きに落下させる。
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rite_of_c: 高位儀式, 効果中は紐づけられた儀式の焦点を作り出す。 焦点が空間を通過すると空気を丸石に変成する。
高位儀式, 効果中は周囲の多すぎる動物を間引きする。
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rite_of_d: 高位儀式, 効果中は紐づけられた儀式の焦点を作り出す。 焦点がブロックを通過するとそれらを破壊する。
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rite_of_e: 低位儀式, 効果中は周囲の敵対生物の魂を強化する。
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rite_of_g: 高位儀式, 効果中は紐づけられた儀式の焦点を作り出す。 焦点がブロックを通過すると重力効果を与え、落下させる。
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rite_of_h: 低位儀式, 効果中はゆっくりと周囲の生物を傷つける。
低位儀式, 効果中はゆっくりと周囲の生物を治癒する。
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rite_of_l: 高位儀式, 効果中は周囲の動物が繁殖状態になる。
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rite_of_n: 低位儀式, 効果中はゆっくりと周囲のプレイヤーのスタミナ回復し、満腹度を長く持続させる。
高位儀式, 効果中は周囲の動物に精神的な育成効果を与え、成長を加速させる。
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rite_of_q: 高位儀式, 効果中は紐づけられた儀式の焦点を作り出す。 焦点がかまどを通過するとその調理プロセスを加速させる。
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rite_of_r: 高位儀式, 効果中は脆弱な敵対生物を即死させる。
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rite_of_s: 高位儀式, 効果中は紐づけられた儀式の焦点を作り出す。 焦点が大釜を通過すると、ドリップストーンからの液体収集が加速される。
高位儀式, 効果中は紐づけられた儀式の焦点を作り出す。 焦点がブロックを通過するとそれらを即座に精錬する。
高位儀式, 効果中は紐づけられた儀式の焦点を作り出す。 焦点がブロックを通過すると骨粉効果や時間加速効果を与える。
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rite_of_t: 低位儀式, 効果中は周囲の生物に熱意の効果を与え、採掘と攻撃速度を上昇させる。
低位儀式, 効果中は周囲の生物を消火し燃え盛る抱擁の効果を与え、持続的な治癒効果を提供する。
低位儀式, 効果中は周囲の生物に掌握の効果を与える。ブロックの操作範囲とアイテムの取得距離が増加する。
低位儀式, 効果中は周囲の生物に良き潮流の効果を与え、釣りの幸運および入れ食いのレベル1相当の効果を与える。
低位儀式, 効果中は周囲の生物に唸る旋風の効果を与える。移動速度と攻撃速度が増加する。
低位儀式, 効果中は周囲の生物にオークの力の効果を与える。素手の時に増加する固定ダメージを提供する。
低位儀式, 効果中は周囲の生物に天の呼び声の効果を与える。ジャンプ力が増加し、重力が軽減され、落下ダメージが最小限に抑えられる。
低位儀式, 効果中は周囲の生物に石の守護の効果を与える。無防備時に効果が増すダメージ軽減を提供する。
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rune_of_a: 疫病退散のルーン implores a body to catalyze and change substance, allowing it to burn through and process negative effects quicker than normal.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rune_of_b: 熱意のルーン bears the rite effect of its namesake, granting 熱意 to its wearer at halved potency, providing a slight increase to attack speed and mining speed.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rune_of_f: 燃え盛る抱擁のルーン bears the rite effect of its namesake, granting 燃え盛る抱擁 to its wearer at halved potency when they are on fire, extinguishing them and providing a passive healing effect.
掌握のルーン bears the rite effect of its namesake, granting 掌握 to its wearer at halved potency, increasing block interaction range and item pickup distance slightly.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rune_of_g: 良き潮流のルーン bears the rite effect of its namesake, granting 良き潮流 to its wearer at halved potency, providing one level worth of benefits granted by Lure.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rune_of_h: 唸る旋風のルーン bears the rite effect of its namesake, granting 唸る旋風 to its wearer at halved potency, increasing movement speed and attack speed.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rune_of_o: オークの力のルーン bears the rite effect of its namesake, granting オークの力 to its wearer at halved potency, .
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rune_of_p: 守護のルーン implores a body to stand fast, granting the user a bonus to Armor equal to about one fifth.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rune_of_s: 焦熱のルーン implores a mind to share its light with others regardless of what that will cause, doubling the strength of fire damage originating from the user.
天の呼び声のルーン bears the rite effect of its namesake, granting 天の呼び声 to its wearer at halved potency, increasing jump height and reducing gravity slightly with minimal fall damage reduction.
石の守護のルーン bears the rite effect of its namesake, granting 石の守護 to its wearer at halved potency, providing a slight damage reduction that grows in power when unarmored.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.rune_of_v: 生命力のルーン implores a body to restore itself, amplifying all healing received by roughly one fifth.
The sap can also be used to create sapballs, able to be used interchangeably with slimeballs for most recipes.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.scarstone: While observing the spread of 汚染 (in controlled conditions, of course), I have found that rarely the metaphysical scarring is potent enough to affect even stone - hence, I have named it 傷石.
It appears to only crop up randomly, and I have not isolated the conditions required. Roughly every tenth time 汚染 spreads, the trauma will carve out a 傷石 deposit.

傷石 is a strange kind of rock, similar to 汚染, in a way. I have identified granite, obsidian, diorite, and andesite flecks, as well as more mundane stone, with no rhyme or reason to the pattern. It doesn't resonate for the purposes of the 無制御儀式, though.

While it doesn't resonate with the 無制御儀式, the stone has a strange... growth? It acts like a plant, despite being a crystal. I do not know what to make of that. Perhaps if I was a biomancer, this might be the discovery of a lifetime.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.soulhunte: Spirit Fabric is an insulator, but that doesn't mean it has to dampen magic. This set of armor is designed to focus that magic, effectively amplifying the user's arcane abilities. Unfortunately, it's not exactly the strongest of materials, and it protects me just about as much as leather clothing.
After further study, I have discovered that the ソウルウッドのproduced by the 無制御儀式 has actually become an entirely different species from the ルーンウッドのit is made from. It grows differently, it acts differently...

It appears the spiritual scars that created it go deeper than just its color and magic. The most obvious differences with the tree itself are shape and leaf color. ソウルウッドのis more spindly than ルーンwood, and its leaves are a sickly purple-red hue instead of a rich orange-yellow. It can still be used for many of the same things, though.

The sticky lifeblood of the tree also seems to well up much more often in ソウルウッドのthan in ルーンwood. The sap's effects are corrupted as well; rather than restoring my vigor, Cursed Sap enhances it, increasing my attack strength and providing damage resistance.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.soulwoven: I often find Spirit アルカナ cluttering my inventory. Why not solve a problem of magic with magic? This pouch acts like a bundle, but also snaps up アルカナ when I collect any. It's physical capacity is no more impressive than that of a bundle with the added benefit of magical items being rotated slightly out of reality, taking up less space.

Although Spirit アルカナ makes up much of the clutter I carry, it is not all that burdens my pockets. By fusing the pouch with rot, it sprouts teeth and transforms into the 貪欲なポーチ. This hungry sack embodies the Gourmet aspect of Gluttony, aggressively snatching up any collected item that matches it's stored appetite.

Soulwoven Silk is a light, yet sturdy material imbued with soulstuff. Like a body, it naturally insulates against arcane energies. While other materials do the same, cloth is far easier to work with in designing than stone.

Soulstuff can glow, as a shattered soul proves. Why not activate that glow within the cloth? I have made banners to test the effect, and used differing reagents and spirits to give a variety of patterns. When imbued, they will glow dimly, or fiercely if given an additional spirit.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.spellweav: A tool, a sister, the Spellweaving Axe is a complex design forged using cthonic gold and imbued with aqueous arcana. When the tool is primed - a simple adjustment of resonance - any block broken will sprout several primitive loci tasked with seeking out and breaking far-out blocks matching the original. Up to four loci are sprouted each time.

A tool, a brother, the Spellweaving Pickaxe is a complex design forged using cthonic gold and imbued with earthen arcana. When the tool is primed - a simple adjustment of resonance - any block broken will sprout several primitive loci tasked with seeking out and breaking nearby blocks matching the original. Up to four loci are sprouted each time.

By imbuing the woven loci with aerial arcana, they hasten and accelerate. By harnessing this property through an enchantment, each 焦点sprouted through the tool's effect will move at a significantly increased rate. Incompatible with Weaver's Propagation

By imbuing the woven loci with eldritch arcana, they fester and multiply. By harnessing this property through an enchantment, each activation of the tool's effect will spawn an additional loci per enchantment level. Incompatible with Weaver's Haste
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.spirit_ja: A simple application of hallowed gold is the Spirit Jar. As spirits in their raw form don't have mass, by trapping them under Hallowed 金のyou can store far more than you could physically. The capacity of these jars is near-infinite, though each only stores one type of spirit.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.spirit_me: 鉄のis mundane, in a word. By attuning the metal with Soulstone, I can create a steel that is $isimultaneously/$ in and out of phase with the world.

Anything made from Soulstained Steel is capable of striking the soul, without the need for specifics of engineering like with my crude scythe. Wearing the metal in its base form as armor is dangerous, as it will touch your own soul as well, so I must engineer a countermeasure.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.strange_c: These 奇妙なクリスタルs are tough, but oddly flexible. The striation is fascinating, and seems to indicate... something, though I know not what.

The material appears to be unreactive to the arcane, making it odder still. I haven't found a use for it, though that might be due to me not being a biologist. The material, as strange as it appears, as strange as 汚染 can be, is just... ordinary.

It is quite pleasant to look at, I suppose, and a curiosity. A... plant? That grows with 汚染, all on its own, with no basis like ソウルウッド's origin as ルーンwood. Fascinating, but ultimately, I have not found a use for it.
Mnemosyne. It bears a striking resemblance to the 奇妙なクリスタル, though they appear unrelated. I am unsure what that means.

Aha. This crystal... it betrays deeper meaning, but is worthless of itself. It bears the marks of othering found in the Fused Consciousness. It is not a mind, but it is a strange, impossible kind of life. Perhaps the striations are the physical encoding of its life...
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.suspiciou: Being opposed, you $ican/$ use 秘術のand 異形のto create an opposition augment. However, this just causes violent entropy as 秘術のflows eagerly into the end state of 異形, and the result is... a corruptive explosion generating 汚染. This entry serves as a warning, not a recommendation.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.sympathy_: 邪悪性と聖性 opposed forces, so why not harness them together? When a Sympathy Drive-affected Crucible's インペタス takes damage, the 邪悪なcharge will remember. When it is healed by the Mending Diffuser, the 聖なるcharge will 'forgive' the damage, repairing further and improving stats generally for three cycles.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.totem_mag: Totems are inherently disorganized, and when grouped, it can be difficult to maintain a consistent order which each totem follows. Following my research into 波動 Artifice, I've devised a solution.

Normally, Spirit 儀式 only activate when enough energy is harnessed from the natural flow of arcana present in the world. By utilizing a 波動 トーテム基礎, this energy will instead be "Cherished" until an inbound redstone pulse is supplied. When weaving multiple 儀式 together, a redstone observer can be used to pinpoint the exact moment a Spirit 儀式 can be activated.

The exact timing of the Redstone Pulse required by the 波動 トーテム基礎 can be rather demanding. Rather than a continuous signal being sufficient, it is only the initial redstone impulse that is considered by it's internal circuits.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.tyrving.3: A Unique limitation however is that the sword cannot sweep and by extension cannot accept Sweeping Edge as an enchantment.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.tyrving.4: The weapon has a strange affinity with sharp volcanic glasses, allowing me to repair it with Obsidian in a Spirit Crucible instead of any more expensive material.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.unchained: Now already scarred, the power bleeds from the soulwood totem in the form of a 汚染-紐づけられた儀式の焦点. 焦点 travels through blight, it will transmute the block above.

As arcane energy within the totem amassed, lacking direction, it dispersed. Chaotic, but expected given the rune composition. The 無指向性儀式 brought about erratic change to the totem; what I dub ソウルウッドのbears scars from the violent method of its creation. Those scars warp magic, altering its fundamental nature.

Any spirit rite performed with a ソウルウッドのtotem will produce a vastly different effect. Following this logic, the behavior of the 無指向性儀式 itself can also be altered by the newly formed soulwood structure...

One of the immediate applications of the 無制御変成 I have found thus far is the ability to transform any ルーンウッドのblock into it's ソウルウッドのequivalent. It works with any wooden block or even the ルーンウッドの苗木 itself
Naturally, the ソウルウッドのトーテム基礎 can be created by using ソウルウッドのin place of ルーンウッドのwithin the Spirit Infusion process.

In Basalt, the rite appears to mimic natural stone's pulverization, but through Nether materials instead. Basalt returns to Magma, which crumbles apart and cools into fleshy Netherrack, and rots into Soul Sand. The souls react poorly with the rite, and 汚染 is the result.

One of a trio of seemingly color-based sequences, Deepslate will - a bit more logically - become Tuff. That Tuff will then degrade into Andesite, which will then rejoin other types of stone in their sequence.

In dirt, the rite encourages growth without any source. The dirt first grows wooden roots through its structure, which then somehow become grass. The mechanism is conceptual, and the next stage makes that even more clear - moss covers the dirt, consuming the entire volume of it. After that point, the growth has no direction to go, and it becomes randomized, creating 汚染.

The 無制御儀式's echoes can scar more than simply ルーンwood. The patterns seem somewhat random, but then, blight is a substance of randomness. Trial and error has identified a myriad of categories of this effect; transmutation trees, of sorts.
The effect of applying these scars depends on what material we start with. The pulsing of the 儀式 will shift any given block forward in the tree, with it degrading into blight given enough time.

In mud, the rite infuses the material with the concept of water. Mud becomes Clay, as it does naturally, but then the Clay crystallizes into mineral Prismarine, which finally gives in to the water, becoming ice. It cannot become more water than frozen water already is, and so becomes 汚染.

One of a trio of seemingly color-based sequences, Packed Mud seems to fulfill the conditions to become Dripstone, oddly enough. That Dripstone will then degrade into Granite, which will then rejoin other types of stone in their sequence.
One of a trio of seemingly color-based sequences, Snow bizarrely will become Calcite. That Calcite will then degrade into Diorite, which will then rejoin other types of stone in their sequence.

In raw stone, the rite powders the stone, bit by bit. The process is exponential - Raw stone becomes cobblestone, which becomes gravel, which becomes sand. Afterwards, the particles fail to divide into a finer substance, and the backlash creates 汚染.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.undirecte: The rite - if you could call something so chaotic that - corrupts and burns through the totem, altering its very base nature, and transmuting the world around it into some indeterminate blighted substance.

Raw arcana provides the basis for all rites. Without power, nothing would be accomplished. This naturally makes one wonder what effect raw arcana would have as the focus of a rite. The answer is a complex and dangerous one.

In order to form any meaningful effect, the spirit rite in question requires far more to form than other rites, taking the entire five runes to activate. It's as though I am pushing on some threshold, and need to break through. And in breaking through... momentum is conserved.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.undoing_g: Ah, a pact that binds forever is a heavy thing. ギアス are potent, yes, and can achieve powerful effects, but their downsides are constant companions. These pacts can be forsworn on the Brazier, allowing you to decide what price you are willing to pay.

To forswear a geas, assemble it on the Brazier as you did initially, but use the Paracausal Flame to kindle the Brazier instead. This will burn the contract $iaway/$ instead of inscribe it. The rest of the process works the same, including Weakness.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.varnished: In forming glazed terracotta, beautiful patterns can easily be formed through the careful use of a furnace's heat. By fusing terracotta with alchemical calx and then with arcana, a similar result can be achieved. Just as with glass, the resulting patterns are quite pretty.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.void.belt: Love. It is a curious thing, but the Belt of the Limitless loves without barrier, without condition. It sees you for what and who you are, and loves you despite. I cannot claim to be comfortable with that, though nor can I deny the utility.

The Belt adds its own Soul Ward to the bearer's, doubling their capacity. The overlaid effects cause the Soul Ward to absorb $iall/$ damage, not merely most. Integrity increases as the Ward grows weaker, giving me a defense when I need it most.
Unfortunately, it is not wholly benefit. The harmonization of the barriers of two minds is taxing, and Soul Ward suffers in its recovery from this exhaustion. I consider the trade worthwhile.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.void.fuse:
The Future Holds Many Secrets... But you may look at some of them early.
 Create the anomalous design by throwing an iron block into the well. Throw the complete design into the well for the fused consciousness.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.void.mali: The armor doesn't influence just inbound magic however. The wearer's own arcane etchings of various sorts are also affected. Their trajectory towards the soul is intercepted - stolen and processed - and in the unraveling of arcana, energy still remains. The armor reacts to that energy, growing stronger alongside it.

Two terms are necessary here. Firstly, the armour's magic absorption process shall be named Malignant Conversion. It is the interception of the flow of arcana towards the soul and the absorption of the resulting energy. Continuing, the armour weaves it's stolen power, giving it a new form and purpose. The resulting effect shall be named 悪性防護

悪性防護 functions as a powerful barrier capable of outright nullifying most forms of inbound harm. As the armor absorbs more and more magic, the Aegis will grow in capacity and potentially recharge rate and gain depending on the attributes absorbed. This, by far, is the strongest property of the Malignant Stronghold Armor
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.void.rune: 異端のルーン decries magic, Silencing foes much like the Erosion Scepter can. This weakens their spirit magic, and the effect can stack up to complete suppression.
不屈のルーン reinforces the user's stance, negating any knockback taken.
生贄の力のルーン grants strength in exchange for the lives taken by a scythe, causing your weapon to grow more potent with each kill for a time.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.void.stav: Spirit crystals can only hold so much power, as I have seen... but that is only true of the strange not-physical matter of the arcana. Capacitor allows the staff to accumulate more energy for the same physical space, allowing it to store about one shot more per level. Modifying the staff this way makes it unable to accept Replenishing.

A staff is a conduit of physical magic. Obviously, it can flow out, and flow in, but it is possible to do that less passively as well. When a Replenishing staff is used in melee, it will occasionally restore the staff's energy pool by about one third of a shot's worth. Modifying the staff this way makes it unable to accept Capacitor.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.void.sund: A knife which thinks, which feels, which hates. The Edge and the Weight are simple things, mere tools to use. The Anchor is more. It knows its enemy, and hates them for the crime of continuing to exist.
It slashes with me, adding magic damage which scars the soul, forcing its Hatred upon the enemy for a time, applying the revocation of progress Malignant armor does by force.

The blade also can be thrown, akin to リバウンド. It will fly like an arrow, pursuing nearby targets with unwavering eagerness, even swerving in the air to strike them, inflicting Hatred and dealing extra damage with each stack of the effect. It will strike entire groups of Hated enemies, one by one, if many are nearby.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.void.unwi: Fused Consciousness can add thought to action, a mind to impose its own will on the world. And this staff, this destruction, oh, how the Unwinding Chaos wills it be.

It blasts enemies with some manner of esoteric effect, and can be charged for a volley. The nature of the attack is not 焦熱のbut 異形, yet it burns all the same, dragging all closer to the promised end of 異形のtruth in utter entropy.
The staff drinks in the pain of the flames and the death of the burning with glee, recharging its internal pool all the faster, advancing the cycle as it so dearly desires.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.voodoo_ma: For utility purposes, you'll also be able to employ poppets with simple jobs such as collecting items, putting items in chests, shearing sheep, harvesting crops, that sort of thing. In the next release, either Voodoo Magic or Mirror Magic will be added to malum.
malum.gui.book.entry.page.text.windweavi: When looking for traces of アルカナ around the world, 大気のbears the most significant presence. All weather phenomena appear to carry faint traces of it, not in the form of a spirit per-say, but rather an exhausted memory of it's influence upon the world. That influence is spent, but with a little effort can be made real again.

These memories of wind rest everywhere, idle and exhausted. And yet, when imbued with 大気, the flow of アルカナ weaves these memories anew, allowing them to influence the world once more. I have created two applications of this effect by extrapolating it's already complete application in Wind Charges and Wind Nuclei.

Wind Charges carry a memory of scattering. Inherently chaotic, it is released on impact. When powered by redstone, the 突風射出機 mimics a wind-burst capable of applying outwards propulsion to anything found nearby. The effect's intensity and exact form can be configured with the 技師の手.

Wind Nuclei are an encapsulated burst of wind, powerful and innately directed. When powered by a connected 突風射出機, 風穴s will continuously weave a rising column of flowing wind capable of transporting most objects and creatures. The effect's distance and direction can be configured with the 技師の手.

$m0.6/$Greed and Haste, fueled by Kinetic Impact.
 -爆発は大幅に強化され、爆発時に強欲を付与する
 -強欲は幸運の確率を向上させる
 -強欲はさらに爆発を強化する
That which you rely on shall eventually crush you.
 -落下ダメージが倍化する

$m0.8/$重力; The greatest force to leverage against.
 -突風はより強いの上昇力を提供し、上昇を付与する
 -上昇状態は大気中での操作性を向上させる
Dance along the edge of danger
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_continuing_sh:
You cannot feign perfection.
 -攻撃を外すと効果が反転する

Precision is Key.
 -遠隔ダメージを与えると弓引き速度が上がる
Step. Form. Ready. Raise. Begin. Draw. Release.
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_fortress.cons:
The added grandeur brings with itself a lethargic nature
 -ソウルワードの回復速度が半減する
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_fortress.pros:
A compression of Soul Ward, made greater and refined.
 -ソウルワードの容量を増加させる
 -ソウルワードの耐久力を半分増加させる
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_fortress.tool: Be strong when you are needed
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_high_priest.c:
$m0.8/$Your over-encroaching grip is a harmful one.
 -射程延長効果は敵からのダメージを受けるとクールダウン状態になる
 -クールダウン状態では移動速度が低下する
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_high_priest.p:
The Whole World is yours.
 -ブロック射程を20%、攻撃射程を10%延長する
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_high_priest.t: Become what they believe, so long as they believe
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_lifeweaver.co:
All creatures are deserving of care.
 -回復 オーラは味方と敵の両方を対象とする
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_lifeweaver.pr:
A rare generosity, everything that you are you will share with others.
 -持続的に回復効果を受ける
 -回復効果は近くの生物と共有される
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_lone_druid: はぐれドルイドの約定
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_lone_druid.co:
To be unburdened is to cull all shackles
 -防具を着用すると魂が切り刻まれる
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_lone_druid.pr:
$m0.7/$To be complete is to be unburdened.
 -空の防具スロット1つにつき、防御力が5ポイント、防御力の堅牢さが2ポイント増加する
 -空の防具スロット1つにつき、被回復量が4分の1増加する
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_parasite.cons:
Your fragility is still very much real.
 -被回復量が40%減少する
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_parasite.pros:
A surplus of confidence imbued onto the mind, your pain is only secondary.
 -精霊回収が耐性効果を与える
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_parasite.tool: Why work for what others have
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_profane_ascet:
Your loyalty to the Rot takes quite a toll on your body.
 -Saturation and Hunger no longer restore health
 -Eating Forsworn Foods brings Ruin

$m0.65/$Rot shall become your greatest friend.
 -Gluttony becomes Trial of Faith, Increasing 回復 Received
 -Trial of Faith lasts Significantly Longer and has an Increased Limit of Power
 -Eating Rotten Foods Heals You and Omits the Demand for Appetite
Forswear indulgence, and be healed by rot
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_profane_glutt:
$m0.8/$The Rot will Consume You.
 -Desperate Need reduces Armor and Magic Resistance
 -Starvation Damage Poisons You
 -Poisoned Foes Spread Poison to You

$m0.6/$Rot shall become your greatest weapon.
 -Gluttony becomes Desperate Need, Increasing Scythe Proficiency Substantially
 -Desperate Need Gains Potency Faster with an Increased Limit of Power
 -Scythe Strikes While Blessed by Desperate Need create an additional Poisonous Slash
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_prospector.co:
Burn with Greed
 -強欲の効果を受けているときに攻撃されると炎に包まれる
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_prospector.pr:
A favor born from flame.
 -貴重な鉱石を採掘すると強欲を得る
 -強欲は段階的に幸運効果を与える
 -強欲効果を受けるとき体力を1ハート分回復する
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_reaper.cons:
To break the bond will be your undoing
 -制約外の武器の与ダメージが9割減になる
 -誓約外の武器は使うたびに劣化する
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_reaper.pros:
A pact forged between your Soul and your Scythe, the Chains of arcana bind you together.
 -鎌による攻撃が稀に追加攻撃を与える
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_shattering_ad:
The Incantation takes quite a toll on you.
 -魂を収穫しない日が続くと飢えが募る

$m0.8/$An Incantation forced onto the mind. An Insatiable Thirst for the arcana
 -魂を砕くとアルカナを多く入手できる
 連鎖的に行うとより増える
Claim what you want, and never stop
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_shield.cons:
The added acceleration brings with itself a brittle nature
 -ソウルワードの耐久力を半減させる
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_shield.pros:
An acceleration of Soul Ward, made to be primed in the nick of time.
 -ソウルワードの容量を増加させる
 -ソウルワードの回復速度を倍加させる
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_shield.toolti: Always be ready to stand and fight
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_skybreaker.co:
That which you impose on others shall come back twice over.
 -受けるノックバックが倍化する
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_skybreaker.pr:
$m0.8/$重力; The greatest force to impose onto others.
 -落下ダメージを受けると周囲にダメージを与える
 -落下ダメージを与えると距離に関係なく対象を追撃する
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_warlock.cons:
Feel anger, cause anger
 -敵に検知される距離が倍化する
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_warlock.pros:
A pact designed to weave anger into pain.
 -あなたの初撃は邪悪なアルカナの力で敵を吹き飛ばす
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_windswept.con:
Be moved by the wind
 -走るのをやめると高速で効果が減退する
 -移動速度が高いほどノックバックを受けやすくなる
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_the_windswept.pro:
Move with the wind.
 -走り続けると移動速度が上がっていく
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_tidal_affinity.co:
The chains of the ocean grip your heart tightly.
 -水の外では体力が回復しない。
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_tidal_affinity.pr:
$m0.7/$Confine yourself to the ocean, memorize the conduit's choral pull.
 -水中では敏捷性、攻撃速度、採掘速度、ダメージ耐性が向上する
 -コンジットパワーはこれらの効果を増幅し、体力を持続的に回復する
malum.gui.geas.pact_of_wyrd_reconstructi:
$m0.8/$The Burning Stars Exhaust You.
 -再構築効果は非常に長いクールダウンを持つ
 -クールダウン中は秘術の共鳴が半減する
 -精霊の収集が空腹をもたらす。

$m0.8/$Unchecked Power derived from Death Itself.
 -運命の再構築により死を回避する
 -再構築が発生すると精霊収集効果が発動し、短期間無敵になる
malum.gui.rite.rite_of_ascension.effect:
紐づけされた儀式の焦点を作る。
焦点がブロックを通ると, 重力反転効果を下のブロックに与える

重力反転効果はシルクタッチで保持できるブロックにのみ影響を与えることができる

紐づけされた儀式の焦点を作る。

影響を受けた動物は消滅する

紐づけされた儀式の焦点を作る。
焦点がブロックを通ると、それらを破壊しようとする

敵対世物は邪悪な力を得る。

malum.gui.rite.rite_of_healing.effect: 影響を受けた生物は2ハート分回復する

影響を受けた動物は繁殖をはじめる

 鶏はより頻繁に卵を産む
 ミツバチはより速く、より頻繁に受粉する
 アレイはより速く複製する
malum.gui.rite.rite_of_quickening.effect:

燃料消費は比例したまま
malum.gui.rite.rite_of_rending.effect: 影響を受けたモンスターは致命的な一撃を受ける
malum.gui.rite.rite_of_sapping.effect:

malum.gui.rite.rite_of_smelting.effect:
紐づけされた儀式の焦点を作る。
焦点がブロックを通ると、それらを精錬しようとする

紐づけされた儀式の焦点を作る。

影響を受けた生物は熱意の効果を得る。

malum.gui.rite.rite_of_the_fiery_embrace:
影響を受けた生物は燃え盛る抱擁の効果を得る。

影響を受けた生物は掌握の効果を得る。

malum.gui.rite.rite_of_the_good_tides.ef:
影響を受けた生物は良き潮流の効果を得る。

影響を受けた生物は唸る旋風の効果を得る。
唸る旋風 は移動速度と攻撃速度を五分の二だけ増加させる
malum.gui.rite.rite_of_the_oaken_might.e:

オークの力 は素手の時に効果が倍増する
malum.gui.rite.rite_of_the_sky_tether.ef:
影響を受けた生物は天の呼び声の効果を得る。
天の呼び声 は重力を減少させ、ジャンプ力を五分の二だけ増加させる
落下ダメージも適度に軽減される
malum.gui.rite.rite_of_the_stone_ward.ef:
影響を受けた生物は石の守護の効果を得る。

石の守護 は無防備の時に効果が倍増する
malum.gui.rite.unchained_rite.effect:
紐づけされた儀式の焦点を作る。
焦点 が汚染を通過し、その上のブロックに影響を与える
影響を受けたブロックは無制御変成を受ける
焦点 は生き残るために汚染を必要とする

effect.malum.aethers_charm.description: 天があなたを 呼んでいる。 ジャンプ力が上昇し、 重力が低下する。
effect.malum.anglers_lure.description: 私の視線と合った魚に、 真の恐怖を教えてやろう。 私は死の先触れなのだから。 水面下の生物にとっての災厄、 深淵へと投げ込まれる我が竿は、 正確で揺るぎない。 この非情な大地に蔑まれた男は、 海に慰めを見出す。 我が唯一の友は、 釣り針の上のミミズのみ。 この不毛な世界に充満する、 致命的な無意味さを乗り越えようと、 もがき、 身をよじる。 私は孤独だ。 私は空虚だ。 それでも私は、 釣りをする。
effect.malum.ascension.description: 鎌による飛翔後、 落下を緩和し、 重力を軽減する。
effect.malum.cancerous_growth.descriptio: 制御不能な成長により 身体が強化され、 最大体力が 増加する。
effect.malum.earthen_might.description: 拳と道具が 大地の力で強化され、 攻撃力が 増加する。
effect.malum.echoing_arcana.description: 制御不能な魔力の拡大により 賢くなり、 秘術の共鳴が 増加する。
effect.malum.gaias_bulwark.description: 土の甲羅が 身体を包み込み、 追加の装甲として 機能する。
effect.malum.gluttony.description: 弱者を喰らい、 空腹と引き換えに 魔法の熟練度が 増加する。
effect.malum.grim_certainty.description: 世界の重みが振動し、 次の一撃が 確定クリティカルになる。
effect.malum.ifrits_embrace.description: 炎の温かい抱擁が 魂を包み込み、 焼け焦げた傷跡を 癒やす。
effect.malum.imminent_deliverance.descri: 救済の刃が振動し、 次の一撃が 確定クリティカルになる。
effect.malum.miners_rage.description: 道具が輝きを帯びて強化され、 採掘速度と攻撃速度が 増加する。
effect.malum.poseidons_grasp.description: さらなる力を求めて 手を伸ばし、 攻撃範囲と アイテム回収距離が 増加する。
effect.malum.reactive_shielding.descript: ルーンの力が 防具と防具強度を 10%強化する。
effect.malum.sacrificial_empowerment.des: ルーンの力が、 刃に 追加の鎌の熟練度を 与える。
effect.malum.silenced.description: 沈黙状態になり、 魔法の使用が 封じられる。
effect.malum.wicked_intent.description: 強力なカウンター攻撃の 準備が整い、 次の鎌攻撃で 無数の斬撃を 繰り出す。
effect.malum.zephyrs_courage.description: 西風が背中を押し、 移動速度が 増加する。
enchantment.malum.animated.desc: 鎌の 攻撃頻度を 向上させる。
enchantment.malum.ascension.desc: 鎌の使用時に プレイヤーを上昇させ、 周囲の敵を 吹き飛ばす。
enchantment.malum.haunted.desc: 武器の 魔法ダメージを 向上させる。
enchantment.malum.rebound.desc: 鎌の使用時に、 ブーメランのように 投げられるようになる。
enchantment.malum.replenishing.desc: 近接ダメージを与えた際、 杖の遠隔攻撃クールダウンを 短縮する。
enchantment.malum.spirit_plunder.desc: 敵を倒した際、 追加の精霊を 刈り取る。
